title: yArige yAruNTu
sahitya:
yArige yAruNTu eravina samsAra nIra mElana guLLe nijavalla hariye


caraNam 1    bAyAridu endu bAvi nIrige pOde bAvili jalabatti baridAidu hariye
    caraNam 2    bisilu gALigAgi marada neraLige pOde mara baggi sirada mEloragidu hariye
    caraNam 3    aDaviyoL mane mADi giDake toTTila kaTTe toTTilina shishu mAyavAyitu hariye
    caraNam 4    tande shrI purandara viTtala nArAyaNa nA sAyo hottige nI kAyo hariye
